item.title: Fully On-Chain Game
item.description: A few specific thoughts, which are not fully formed nor validated, about fully on-chain games and their future. Fully on-chain games (FOCG), as a standalone category, are vastly more different from play-to-earn (P2E) games like Axie than P2E games from traditional, web2 games. This is because neither converting all ownable objects into freely tradable NFTs, nor launching a game token representing the ecosystem and participation value, impose real constraints on the game system/logic itself.

item.title: Thoughts on Virtual Worlds
item.description: With credits to Kevin Zhang, the Dark Forest team, and guiltygyoza. First, defining what I mean by a virtual world.
